lead_paragraph: SCHECHTMAN--Seymour, 92, died on March 19, 2016 in Princeton, NJ. He formerly practiced dentistry in Bay Shore, NY. Widower to Roslyn Wallace Schechtman and Laurette Baumann Schechtman. He is survived by his daughter (Myra), his three sons (Gordon, Joel and Steven) and his many grandchildren and great-grandchildren of whom he was very proud. For information go to jewish-funeral-home.com. 1/3
